00009     void PluginManager::beginRun(const G4Run* run) {
00010         for (PluginVec::iterator it = plugins_.begin(); it != plugins_.end(); it++) {
00011             if ((*it)->hasRunAction()) {
00012                 (*it)->beginRun(run);
00013             }
00014         }
00015     }
00016 
00017     void PluginManager::endRun(const G4Run* run) {
00018         for (PluginVec::iterator it = plugins_.begin(); it != plugins_.end(); it++) {
00019             if ((*it)->hasRunAction()) {
00020                 (*it)->endRun(run);
00021             }
00022         }
00023     }

00073     G4ClassificationOfNewTrack PluginManager::stackingClassifyNewTrack(const G4Track* track) {
00074 
00075         // Default value of a track is fUrgent.
00076         G4ClassificationOfNewTrack currentTrackClass = G4ClassificationOfNewTrack::fUrgent;
00077 
00078         for (PluginVec::iterator it = plugins_.begin(); it != plugins_.end(); it++) {
00079             if ((*it)->hasStackingAction()) {
00080 
00081                 // Get proposed new track classification from this plugin.
00082                 G4ClassificationOfNewTrack newTrackClass = (*it)->stackingClassifyNewTrack(track, currentTrackClass);
00083 
00084                 // Only set the current classification if the plugin changed it.
00085                 if (newTrackClass != currentTrackClass) {
00086 
00087                     // Set the track classification from this plugin.
00088                     currentTrackClass = newTrackClass;
00089                 }
00090             }
00091         }
00092 
00093         // Return the current track classification.
00094         return currentTrackClass;
00095     }
00096 
00097     void PluginManager::stackingNewStage() {

00100                 (*it)->stackingNewStage();

00103     }

00113     UserActionPlugin* PluginManager::findPlugin(const std::string& pluginName) {
00114         UserActionPlugin* foundPlugin = nullptr;
00115         for (PluginVec::iterator iPlugin = plugins_.begin(); iPlugin != plugins_.end(); iPlugin++) {
00116             if ((*iPlugin)->getName() == pluginName) {
00117                 foundPlugin = *iPlugin;
00118                 break;
00119             }
00120         }
00121         return foundPlugin;
00122     }
00123 
00124     void PluginManager::create(const std::string& pluginName, const std::string& libName) {
00125         if (findPlugin(pluginName) == nullptr) {
00126             UserActionPlugin* plugin = pluginLoader_.create(pluginName, libName);
00127             registerPlugin(plugin);
00128         } else {
00129             std::cerr << "[ PluginManager ] - Plugin " << pluginName << " already exists." << std::endl;
00130             throw new std::runtime_error("Plugin already loaded.");
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134     void PluginManager::destroy(const std::string& pluginName) {
00135         UserActionPlugin* plugin = findPlugin(pluginName);
00136         if (plugin != nullptr) {
00137             destroy(plugin);
00138         }
00139     }
00140 
00141     void PluginManager::destroy(UserActionPlugin* plugin) {
00142         if (plugin != nullptr) {
00143             deregisterPlugin(plugin);
00144             pluginLoader_.destroy(plugin);
00145         }
00146     }
00147 
00148     std::ostream& PluginManager::print(std::ostream& os) {
00149         for (PluginVec::iterator iPlugin = plugins_.begin(); iPlugin != plugins_.end(); iPlugin++) {
00150             os << (*iPlugin)->getName() << std::endl;
00151         }
00152         return os;
00153     }
00154 
00155     void PluginManager::registerPlugin(UserActionPlugin* plugin) {
00156         plugins_.push_back(plugin);
00157     }
00158 
00159     void PluginManager::deregisterPlugin(UserActionPlugin* plugin) {
00160         std::vector<UserActionPlugin*>::iterator pos = std::find(plugins_.begin(), plugins_.end(), plugin);
00161         if (pos != plugins_.end()) {
00162             plugins_.erase(pos);
00163         }
00164     }
00165 
00166     void PluginManager::destroyPlugins() {
00167         for (unsigned iPlugin = 0; iPlugin < plugins_.size(); iPlugin++) {
00168             destroy(plugins_[iPlugin]);
00169         }
00170         plugins_.clear();
00171     }
